alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:47PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central McMullen and southwestern Live Oak Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 847 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Simmons, or 12 miles southeast of Tilden, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... George West and Clegg. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 630 and 638. US Highway 59 between mile markers 718 and 740. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
